name: Optifye.ai
long_description:
Optifye.ai is an AI powered performance monitoring system for factory workers. 

We place cameras in assembly lines and use computer vision to tell supervisors who's working and who's not, in real-time.

The shop floor has historically been a blackbox. With Optifye, manufacturing companies can now accurately measure worker performance and boost assembly line efficiency.
one_liner: AI Performance Monitoring For Factory Workers
